drift.description: When circling the target, it will either use the strafe setting or drift depending on

reposition.description: When repositioning around the target, it will use these setting.

navigation_agent_type.description: [string]The agent type to use when navigating in combat. Agent types are specified in global.havok_ai_properties.

rotate_target_intercept_time.description: How far ahead to predict movement in seconds, when determining rotation towards target.

rotate_toward_target.description: [bool]Attempts to always rotate towards target by default. Remember that other systems/abilities can override this behavior.

follow_squad_leader.description: [bool]If not the leader, then by default move towards them
